Instruction: Heat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) and grease two baking sheets.
Mix the flour and baking powder together in a bowl.

Cream butter and sugar in a mixing bowl with an electric mixer until smooth and creamy. Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition. Mix in vanilla. Gradually incorporate the flour mixture until well blended.
Form small ropes by rolling walnut-sized amounts of dough. Create a loop shape with each rope, pressing the ends together to seal. Space them 2 inches apart on the baking sheets.
Bake in the oven that has been preheated until the edges turn firm and golden, around 8 to 10 minutes. Once done, take them out of the oven and let them cool on a wire rack.
